subject: Feedback
description_text:
Good morning

I wanted to reach out to you to share some feedback regarding your pedals.

I recently upgraded my Simsonn pedals to the Plus X Pedals. I purchased the
3 pedal set. I also purchased the base plate to suit.

The pedals are suitable for my needs although I believe the metal could be
finished better to prevent sharp edges.

I then decided to add the haptic motors to the throttle and brake. This is
where I have run into some issues. I misunderstood the website and ordered
2 haptic motors believing my current control box was suitable. Again, I
found it very difficult to understand what was required. I emailed for some
guidance but never received a reply so I went ahead and ordered them
without a control box thinking my control box would work.

They arrived eventually, (your postage service is incredibly slow) and I
was unable to install them immediately. I attempted to install them today
only to discover I do, in fact, need the upgraded control box. Now I am
becoming extremely unhappy and frustrated with my decision to purchase
these pedals. I have ordered a new control box with express shipping hoping
it arrives in a timely manner.

My biggest disappointment however, is the fact that to finally get this
working with the haptics has cost me a total of  $468.20. This is for the
older pedals. For an extra $77.60, a total of $545.80 I could have
purchased the Pro X Ultra Pedals. As you know this includes 3 haptic motors
and the RGB lighting, as well as carbon fibre heel plate and is the latest
design of the pedals.

I can't help but feel my money would have been better spent elsewhere. I
have owned these since April and no longer have the original packaging. If
I did I would be returning all of the items for a refund to purchase the
upgraded pedals.

I strongly believe you should make the website clearer as to what is
required when upgrading these pedals and lower the price of the older
models. I bought these on the recommendation of a Youtube content creator
from the UK who spoke very highly of them. I guess I would speak highly of
them as well if I received them for free. I am currently building sim rigs
for 2 people and have been asked for my recommendation of hardware. I will
not recommend Simsonn because even though the product is reasonable quality
for the price, I feel I have been let down by your company.

Sincerely
Dean Merchant .

P.S. My order numbers to prove what I have said are:
SSN1291
SSN1292
SSN1607
SSN2056

conversations.body_text: Hi Dean Merchant,  We do offer Australian power plugs. Simply leave a note in your order specifying “Australian plug.” We also provide US, EU, and UK plug options.
Hi Dean Merchant,     I have already noted in the order that I need an Australian power plug.

How do I cancel the order?

I will not be buying another part. This is exactly what I meant with my previous email. I’m going to another brand. 

Dean Merchant 

>

 Thanks 
 Dean Merchant

Hi Dean Merchant,    I'm sorry for the hassle, as you are purchasing these products separately, it will be more expensive and we will be bearing the even higher cost of shipping, hope you can understand. We can replace it with a Plus X control box and refund the difference, please don't worry.

Please change it to the correct control box and refund the difference. I
paid for express postage so I would like it sent as a matter of urgency
please.

On Sat, Jul 19, 2025 at 8:16 PM service@simsonn.com
I have purchased another set of pedals. Please cancel this order. Dean Merchant.

Hi Dean Merchant,     Sorry, your parcel was dispatched for you on the 19th after we received your despatch reminder, we only sent you a despatch notification today at work. We have been unable to cancel it for you, sincere apologies!
